name: IDB CivicLytics Citibeats
description:
On March 25th, 2020, amidst the COVID-19 emergency, Citibeats, alongside with the Inter-American Development Bank (IADB, or BID in Spanish), published an observatory to listen and help better understand the needs of people in Latin America and the Caribbean based on Twitter data.
The observatory has been created using Citibeats’s proprietary AI, which uses ML and NLP to detect changes in the needs of people in Latin America and the Caribbean.

sdgs.sdg: SDG1: End Poverty in all its forms everywhere
sdgs.relevance: The IDB Group is the main source of financing for economic and social development in Latin America and the Caribbean. The IDB Group contributes to improving lives by providing development solutions to the three development actors: governments, private sector and civil society.
